Socialising - Text 1

Students who form study groups and/or have good social networks tend to do better than those who do not so we recommend you try and create and maintain study groups and networks. This is something students have to organise themselves so make use of some of the many free message boards or forum websites, free online voice software like skype or free group video websites. Or you can arrange to physically meet up at a time and place suits you.
